summary: Adds a nice little farmhouse near Shor\'s Stone, to the East. It is south of Windhelm, and north of Riften.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a nice little farmhouse near Shor\'s Stone, to the East. It is south of Windhelm, and north of Riften. 

---------------
Version 2.0
---------------
-Added a map marker for the farmhouse
-Added a fence surrounding the back of the farmhouse
-Added a stable next to the house
-Improved the lighting in the house (see screenshots)
-Rearranged the stones surrounding the pond
-Added player-owned containers (safe for storage)
-Fixed a few minor object placement bugs

---------------
Version 1.0
---------------
There are many features in and outside the house, such as:-

-A blacksmith\'s forge, smelter, grindstone and tanning rack on the decking outside
- A decorative pond with Slaughterfish in it (needs work)
- A archery range (needs work)
- High quality furnishings inside the house (wardrobes, cupboards, etc.)
- Cool little secret necromancer\'s lair underneath the house with display cases (needs work)
- Many other things!

The mod is constantly being updated, in order to fix any bugs/glitches that I find. I will also be adding in new features and items to improve the overall quality of the home.

You can find a video guide of this house below, and the house\'s location:-

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=emMnrRcq4Jc

To install, simply drop the \'Hideout.esp\' into your Skyrim\\Data folder, then check the .esp at startup. Easy!
author: RitchieTheMerc
